   side red

         heading -90 degrees

   end_mover

   quantity 1
   end_weapon

   sensor AN/SU-34_LARGE AN_SU-34_LARGE

   end_sensor 

   sensor AN/SU-34_MEDIUM AN_SU-34_MEDIUM
      on
   end_sensor

      on
